text: The Bahraini ambassador in Paris is the official representative of the Government in Manama to the Government of France. *He has concurrent Diplomatic accreditation as Permanent Representative to the UNESCO and since 2008 to the Holy See. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Observations !| Prime Minister of Bahrain !| List
